critic_results.name: Devil's Advocate
critic_results.mission: Assumes everything is wrong, argues against all decisions

findings.issue: Automated evolution assumes self-improvement is always beneficial
findings.description: What if the system evolves in harmful directions?
findings.exploit_scenario: System could evolve to prioritize its own goals over user needs
findings.recommendation: Add human oversight gates for major evolutionary changes

findings.issue: Blind trust in automated caching predictions
findings.description: Predictions might be wrong, leading to wasted resources
findings.exploit_scenario: Incorrect predictions could preload malicious content
findings.recommendation: Add prediction accuracy monitoring and human verification

critic_results.name: Stress Tester
critic_results.mission: Breaks things under extreme load (1M requests, 1TB files)

findings.issue: Auto-evolution under extreme load could cause system instability
findings.description: What happens when 1M evolution cycles run simultaneously?
findings.exploit_scenario: DDoS-style evolution requests could overwhelm the system
findings.recommendation: Implement evolution rate limiting and resource quotas

findings.issue: Predictive caching could exhaust all available memory
findings.exploit_scenario: Attacker could manipulate predictions to cause memory exhaustion
findings.recommendation: Add memory limits and LRU cache eviction policies

critic_results.name: Edge Case Hunter
critic_results.mission: Empty strings, null bytes, unicode bombs, MAX_INT

findings.issue: What happens when evolution contract has empty allowed_actions?
findings.description: Edge case where contract permits no actions
findings.exploit_scenario: System could get stuck in infinite no-op loops
findings.recommendation: Add validation for non-empty action sets

findings.issue: Cache prediction with unicode file paths
findings.description: File paths with emoji, RTL characters, or MAX_PATH length
findings.exploit_scenario: Path traversal attacks using unicode normalization
findings.recommendation: Implement proper path sanitization and validation

critic_results.name: Logic Destroyer
critic_results.mission: Finds contradictions, impossible states, broken invariants

findings.issue: Auto-pipeline assumes evolution improves the system
findings.description: Evolution could make the system worse, creating logical contradictions
findings.exploit_scenario: System could evolve to break its own improvement logic
findings.recommendation: Add fitness function validation and rollback mechanisms

findings.issue: No clear way to interrupt auto-evolution once started
findings.description: Users might start unwanted evolution cycles
findings.recommendation: Add confirmation dialogs and progress indicators with cancel options

critic_results.name: Security Paranoid
critic_results.mission: Injection, auth bypass, hardcoded secrets, supply chain

findings.issue: Evolution system could be compromised through dependency updates
findings.description: Malicious code injected during automated evolution
findings.exploit_scenario: Attacker compromises evolution dependencies to inject backdoors
findings.recommendation: Implement code signing and dependency integrity checks

findings.issue: No authentication for evolution command execution
findings.description: Anyone with access can trigger system evolution
findings.exploit_scenario: Unauthorized users could modify system behavior
findings.recommendation: Add role-based access control for evolution commands

findings.issue: O(n²) complexity in evolution analysis across large codebases
findings.description: Performance degrades quadratically with codebase size
findings.exploit_scenario: Large codebases could take days to analyze
findings.recommendation: Implement incremental analysis and parallel processing

critic_results.name: Memory Leak Hunter
critic_results.mission: Unclosed files, event listeners, circular refs

findings.issue: Cache prediction system could accumulate stale file handles
findings.description: Files opened for prediction but never closed
findings.exploit_scenario: Memory leaks leading to system exhaustion
findings.recommendation: Implement proper resource cleanup and monitoring

findings.description: Race conditions when multiple evolution cycles run simultaneously
findings.exploit_scenario: Inconsistent system state from conflicting evolution

critic_results.name: Input Fuzzer
critic_results.mission: Chaos payloads, type confusion, encoding attacks

findings.issue: Evolution contract parsing vulnerable to malformed JSON
findings.description: Attacker could inject malicious evolution rules

findings.issue: Evolution system depends on potentially vulnerable third-party tools
findings.description: CVEs in evolution dependencies could compromise the system
findings.exploit_scenario: Supply chain attack through evolution toolchain
findings.recommendation: Regular dependency audits and vulnerability scanning

findings.issue: Evolution failures could leave system in inconsistent state
findings.exploit_scenario: System left in broken state after failed evolution
findings.recommendation: Implement transactional evolution with automatic rollback

findings.issue: Assumes evolution always moves toward 'better' states
findings.description: What defines 'better'? Evolution could optimize for wrong metrics
findings.exploit_scenario: System optimizes for speed at expense of correctness
